extendedInfo.description: Deem Ground Driver is a comprehensive driver-assist and productivity tool for chauffeurs to use on their smart phone.  Deem Ground Driver facilitates two-way communication between drivers and dispatch operations.  20th century protocols (paper, phone calls) and the errors associated with driver communication are now a thing of the past! *NOTE*  This app is intended for ground transportation providers using the Voyageur Reserve back office system!Some of the great features embedded in Deem Ground Driver include:*	Two-way message communication between dispatch and driver*	Turn by turn directions and voice navigation for each leg of a trip*	View dispatched (active) and completed (historical) trips from Voyageur Reserve *	GPS tracking capability*	Driver status updates (including passenger on board and ride complete)*	On Location status including the ability for a driver to return their exact location back to the passenger*	Real time flight arrival status updates (including gate meet and baggage claim)*	Final trip charge (including gratuity override and signature capability)*	Book in zone and view queue position capability*	Nighttime viewing mode
